alert.note: Alert for McDonald; Newton (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 7:02PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN NEWTON AND MCDONALD COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM CDT... At 702 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Anderson, or 11 miles northwest of Pineville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Sugar Creek State Park, Anderson, Noel, Dodge, Goodman, South West City, Pineville, Wheaton, Lanagan, Stella, Cayuga, Tiff City, Powell and Rocky Comfort. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Missouri.
